00001 #include "ORLogger.hh"
00002 #include "TFile.h"
00003 #include "TObjString.h"
00004 #include "ORHeader.hh"
00005 
00006 using namespace std;
00007 
00008 /*
00009   This exmaple program demonstrates how to reload an ORHeader with the
00010   raw xml stored as a TObjString in an output file created by OrcaRoot.
00011 */
00012 
00013 int main(int argc, char** argv)
00014 {
00015   if(argc != 2) {
00016     ORLog(kError) << "Usage: " << argv[0] << " [root file]" << endl;
00017     return 1;
00018   }
00019 
00020   TFile* orFile = TFile::Open(argv[1]);
00021   if(orFile == NULL) return 1;
00022 
00023   TObjString* headerOS = (TObjString*) orFile->Get("headerXML");
00024   ORHeader header(headerOS->GetString().Data(), headerOS->GetString().Length());
00025 
00026   cout << header.GetDictionary()->GetName() << endl;
00027   ORDictValueA* ncdGeometry = (ORDictValueA*) header.LookUp("NcdModel:NcdDetector:Geometry");
00028   cout << ncdGeometry->GetName() << ":" << endl;
00029   for(size_t i=0; i<ncdGeometry->GetNValues(); i++) {
00030     cout << ((ORDictValueS*) ncdGeometry->At(i))->GetS() << endl;
00031   }
00032 
00033   return 0;
00034 }
